It's always nice to get a little something extra, didn't really seem to impact the way I play all that much. When my friends are around, I play with them. When they're not, I get spammed from people I don't usually talk to to join games.

It was nice for the couple games when I had friends online at the same time, but mostly I had to solo queue - so it felt like I was missing out on the huge IP bonuses everyone else was getting.
A good idea, though.
